SEARCH

Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminHomepageController
    Controller for the admin homepage.
    AdminUserListController
    Controller for the admin user list.
    AlbumListController
    AlbumListController class is the controller for the album list view.
    ChooseAlbumController
    Controller for the choose album view.
    EditTagsController
    Controller class for the EditTags view.
    GalleryController
    GalleryController class is the controller for the gallery view.
    GalleryImageViewController
    GalleryImageViewController class to control the gallery image view This class is responsible for displaying the photos in the gallery and handling the selection of a photo.
    HomepageController
    HomepageController class to control the homepage view This class is responsible for displaying the albums in the homepage and handling the selection of an album.
    LoginController
    Controller for the login screen Handles the login button being clicked If the username is "admin", the admin homepage is loaded If the username is a user in the app, the homepage is loaded If the username is not a user in the app, an error alert is shown
    SearchResultsController
    Controller class for the search results screen.
    SeparatePhotoDisplayController
    Controller class for the separate photo display view.
    SlideshowViewController
    Controller class for the slideshow view This class is responsible for the functionality of the slideshow view It allows the user to view the photos in the album in a slideshow The user can go to the next photo or the previous photo
    TagsListController
    Controller for the TagsList.fxml This controller is used to display the tags of a photo in a list view
    TagTypeListController
    Controller for the list of tag types This class is responsible for displaying the list of tag types in the GUI It is also responsible for adding and deleting tag types from the list
